title: BEST OF 2019: Luxury Lodge Stay with Ski Valet in Lake Tahoe
description: Embrace the beauty of the largest alpine lake in North America with a stay in a classic ski chalet at The Lodge at Edgewood Tahoe. Discover a skier’s paradise on the slopes of the Sierra Nevada Mountains, then return to tranquil bliss on the edge of the sapphire freshwater lake. Enjoy the gorgeous outdoors of South Lake Tahoe and receive US$50 daily breakfast credit, one 50-minute massage per room and a bottle of wine on arrival. The amenity resort fee is included, offering the following fantastic benefits: a ski valet and shuttle to Heavenly Ski Resort, welcome glass of champagne, personal concierge, daily yoga class, daily 'Aprés Sleep' cart with wellness treats, nightly s'mores around the fire, access to the lakefront hot tub, nightly turndown service and more.

title: Modern Reno Marriott Stay with Onsite Bistro, Starbucks & UpLift Fitness Hub
offer_address: 6855 S Virginia St, Reno, NV 89511, United States
